sentences.en: Among his cohorts were the now - famous artists Degas, Monet and Cezanne.
sentences.cn: 与他趣味相投的朋友包括现在声名卓著的艺术家德迦 、 莫奈和塞尚.

sentences.en: Degas also sculpted dancers and bathers in wax and clay.
sentences.cn: 他还用腊和泥塑造过舞女和沐浴者形象.

sentences.en: Degas captured a dark , yet dreamlike world of ballet.
sentences.cn: 窦加抓住了芭蕾舞世界中朦胧而梦幻般的影像.

sentences.en: Degas is probably my favorite pastel artist.
sentences.cn: 德加大概算是我最喜爱的彩色粉笔画家了.

sentences.en: Degas is usually classed with the impressionists.
sentences.cn: 德加通常被归入到印象派一类.

sentences.en: Degas's work had been a revelation to her.
sentences.cn: 德加的作品曾经让她大开眼界。

sentences.en: Early in his life Degas began to have problems with eyesight.
sentences.cn: 德加在早年的生涯中视力开始出现问题.

sentences.en: Edgar Degas , French Impressionist painter and sculptor , was born in Paris.
sentences.cn: 法国印象派画家、雕刻家 埃德加·狄加 诞生于巴黎.

sentences.en: For Degas, sculpture was never more than ancillary to his painting ( Herbert Read )
sentences.cn: 对于德加来说, 雕刻不过是从属于绘画的一门艺术 ( 赫伯特里德 )

sentences.en: He recognized the painting as an early work by Degas.
sentences.cn: 他认出了这幅画是德加的早期作品.

sentences.en: I am analyzing the total degas.
Morisot and Degas moved in the same social circles.
sentences.cn: 莫里索特与德加斯出入相同的社交圈。

sentences.en: The hallmark of Degas'art was world of theatre, dance and music.
sentences.cn: 他的艺术特色反映在戏剧 、 舞蹈和音乐的世界中.

sentences.en: The vacuum degas unit consists of vacuum degas machine, vacuum pump and acentric pump.
sentences.cn: 真空脱气机组包括真空脱气机 、 真空泵及离心泵.

sentences.en: Wilbur : I do care for ballet, whether in performance or Degas.
sentences.cn: 我确实喜欢芭蕾舞, 无论是真正的表演还是德加的画.
